name: QubeFall© Free for Oculus Quest
description:
Dive into the world of Cloudnone with this immensely addictive block puzzle game for Oculus Quest. Intuitive, dexterous controls allow you to build intricate shapes naturally as you grab new blocks out of the air. Race against time to eliminate as many blocks as possible before you hit the ceiling.

Grab the blocks as they fall and assemble them into neat combinations in the playing field. Complete your combinations to make the blocks disappear and rack up your high scores.

The whole experience is set to music provided by chill-out maestro CloudNone, officially licensed from MonsterCat music. QubeFall© Free contains the full audio/visual environment for WISH.

Support Qubefall© Free as we work to bring you the full game. With enough support, we’re looking to add a host of awesome features:

  • Natural hand tracking support
  • More tracks from Cloudnone with matching VR environments
  • Immersive, audio-synced environments

Get involved with QubeFall's future on our Discord channel. Send in feedback, make suggestions, and talk to us about anything and everything QubeFall©:

https://discord.gg/WXdsvNb

Don’t forget to follow and subscribe to Things3D and Cloudnone ;

https://twitter.com/things3dvr

http://cloudnone.co/

http://instagram.com/cloudnonemusic

http://facebook.com/cloudnonemusic
